website_summaries.verdict: This bodyboard feels compact and easy to handle in the waves.
pros: Good quality construction for the price
Comes in 4 color schemes.Textured top board helps rider stay on
Slick underside provides good movement in the waves
A really great choice for kids
cons: The leash that comes with this board does not have a coil feature

customer_reviews.title: By a better brand unless you will only use this is very light condition
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after one day! Right side rail foam where your hand would be became delaminated after one use at Zuma Beach not to mention the included leash also broke. I could try to fix it with super glue but it would probably happen again. I should’ve bought a better brand! I knew this would be a starter board for my son but very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shah Kieran Mundell

customer_reviews.title: Great fun in the waves!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Younger 39 inch bodyboard we've bought, since the first one worked out so well. After numerous outings, they're both still in great condition. They're a great size for my 10-year-old son, teenage daughter, and myself to all be comfortable using (we range from 58" to 69" tall).
customer_reviews.author: gamermom

customer_reviews.title: Plastic piece that holds leash to board broke.
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 of these boards. They work great. The only complaint that I have is the plastic piece that holds the leash to the board broke. I have only used this board 1 time. If someone could please let me know how to get a new plastic piece to hold the leash to the board that would be great! Otherwise the board is useless to me & a waste of money. We would lose this board in the Gulf/Ocean without the leash. The other boards have held up well over the past 2 years & the kids & adults love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for first time bodyboarders
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, I bought it 3 sizes bigger than what is recommended. Figured she would grow into it my next summer. She has wiped out plenty on this to include being bloodied up and chipped tooth. The board is still in good shape. Seems sturdy enough lasted whole summer and sure it will last next year as well.
customer_reviews.author: ronny

customer_reviews.title: We were at the beach every day all day riding waves with the boogie board and it held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived arrived when I expected it to be delivered. I bought this board for my 10 year old niece who is 4'11" and she used it during our week-long vacation at the beach. When I asked her to rate it, she gave the board two thumbs up! We were at the beach every day all day riding waves with the boogie board and it held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: This was a great board for our beach vacation
customer_reviews.text: Research the size that you need—it makes a big difference! This was a great board for our beach vacation. Not too expensive, but worked perfectly for the week we used it.
customer_reviews.author: :D-

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no damage!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, packaged well. Love the bright colors. Have three other Younger boards can't wait to use it. The one we bought last year is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M Halterman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect first board for my kids. Only thing I don’t like is the leash. Otherwise great board for someone looking to get into the sport
customer_reviews.author: Vincent M.

customer_reviews.title: The glue of the upper layer, which covers the ...
customer_reviews.text: The glue of the upper layer, which covers the board doesn't hold. I have three Younger boards. Happened to three of them!
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality--worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boards for a family vacation, and they worked wonderfully! I was even complimented on the quality of my board by a seasoned body boarder.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty 408

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun on Florida east coast.
customer_reviews.text: I weigh over 150 and have a good time with this bodyboard. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DorothyJ

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for 11 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for 11 year old grandson. He's ready for some bigger surf now, and likes the look of this Bodyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this board. Fits perfectly for an 11 yo child.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana T.

customer_reviews.title: Leash broke after 1 day of use
customer_reviews.text: The board itself seems fine, but the leash broke after 1 day of use under very mild surfing conditions. We had to tie it back several times using nautical knots. Hence the two stars.
customer_reviews.author: DOKTORBUBO

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this board it's fantastic for the beach! Good quality & great design!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board. I am 200lbs and this board is perfect for me. Have not had very long, but seem to take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, rigid board for serious surfing
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to find a really good board for serious body boarding but these are as good as they get, especially for this price. I'm very happy with mine, I surf it on Santa Cruz waves up to 5-6 feet. Very good quality board, very rigid, good shape, I'm happy I studied the reviews. You can buy much worse boards for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for Xmas gifts for the kids who are recently into body boarding. Local surf shops were charging a premium so I went with these due to the reviews. After hundreds of wavs they've proven durable and easy to maneuver in the water. Kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: SeanO

customer_reviews.title: Quality bodyboard that is lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent quality board that is lightweight to carry and durable as well. Took it to the beach and it’s held up after hours of riding waves. The board comes with a wristband strap so you won’t lose it in the lake or ocean. The wristband band strap has a foam lining so it won’t irritate your skin and has a long adjustable velcro strap. The board has about a 20” width at it’s widest point and is a good size for kids and adults. The foam deck is comfortable to stretch out on and the board’s slick bottom glides easily across water. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: great item but Not Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in Gulf in November for my 10 year old son. He was about 95 pounds and 54 inches tall. The item was not made in the USA as advertised but I did not have time to return it prior to our trip. Otherwise it would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

product_meta.title: Younger 39 inch Super Bodyboard with IXPE Deck, Perfect Surfing
product_meta.description:
Younger Bodyboards are designed to last. Constructed of an IXPE Deck, EPS Core, and using heat lamination technology, these boards lead the industry in strength and durability. Compact and lightweight these boards have increased maneuverability with 60/40 rails. Professional Quality leash with wristband is included for Easy Retrieval. With a Younger board you'll be enjoying the surf for hours in no time.

Size : 39 inch 
Weight: : 2 pound 
Color : Bonzai Blue / Yellow / Grey 
Construction : IXPE Deck, EPS Core, Heat Lamination Technology 
Rails : 60/40 Underside
feature_bullets: IXPE deck, EPS core, Heat lamination Technology, offers impact strength durability, Lightweight & Rigid.
HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) super slick bottom with channels and a crescent tail.
Compact feeling and water resistant for all wave conditions. 60/40 rails allow for more maneuverability and skills.
Include Pro Quality leash with wristband to keep board nearby.
39" board, Stylish design, three colors (blue, yellow and grey) for choise, offer more surfing fun.
